title: Robert Manzenreiter
text:
Robert Manzenreiter (born August 28, 1966 in <a href="Innsbruck">Innsbruck</a>) is an <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n <a href="luge">luge</a>r who competed during the late 1980s and early 1990s. He won two silver medals in the mixed team event at the <a href="FIL%20World%20Luge%20Championships">FIL World Luge Championships</a> (<a href="FIL%20World%20Luge%20Championships%201991">1991</a>, <a href="FIL%20World%20Luge%20Championships%201993">1993</a>).
Manzenreiter also finished sixth in the men's singles event at the <a href="1992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Albertville">Albertville</a>. , he is training coordinator for the Austria <a href="luge">luge</a> team.
